About Planmitrip

PlanmiTrip is committed to provide the best of Tour Cab services and enabling travellers to plan and book the perfect trip everyday,everywhere.

Today, Planmitrip is much more than just a travel portal or a famous pioneering brand - it is a one-stop-travel-shop that offers the broadest selection of travel products and services in India.

PlanMiTrip’s Services:

  • Tour Cab bookings
  • International and Domestic Air Tickets, Holiday Packages and Hotels
  • Domestic Bus and Rail Tickets
  • Private Car and Taxi Rentals
  • B2B and Affiliate Services
